actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for conservation, exploration, development, and use of naval petroleum reserves and naval oil shale reserves, for fiscal year 1981 and for fiscal year 1982, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations to the Department of Energy for fiscal years 1981 and 1982 for conservation, exploration, development, and use of the naval petroleum reserves and the naval oil shale reserves.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for conservation, exploration, development, and use of naval petroleum reserves and naval oil shale reserves, for fiscal year 1981 and for fiscal year 1982, and for other purposes.
